name: Towards The Sky (itch)
description:
Towards The Sky is a short platformer game for Windows. You play as a squirrel, collect mutagens for extra powers, and throw explosive nuts all over the place.

Controls:
Quit game - ESC
Restart game - R
Cheat ammo - P
Cheat godmode - C
Move - WASD, arrow keys
Jump - Numpad 4, space
Run - Numpad 5, shift
Shoot - Numpad 6, ctrl
